Description: Worked flint object, roughly drop shaped. Nibbling along the dorsal right lateral, more invasive retouch along the dorsal left lateral forming a point at the distal end, salient bulb. Borer, or perhaps a preform for an arrowhead. Yellowish-brown to red coloured translucent stone, fine-grained.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amara West (Nubia), Mound ß, trial trench II
